remarks: The isomorphism H is one-to-one.  Part of proof after Lemma N of [Crawley] p. 122 line 6.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Mar-2014.)
statement:
dih11.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dih11.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dih11.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dih11 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( I ` X ) = ( I ` Y ) <-> X = Y ) ) $.
